message:
SYSTEM: Hypernym-3.pdf: Página 9
Hypernym Detection
Approaches
9
Approaches for Hypernym detection from text:
1) Pattern Based Approaches
Using lexico-synctactic patterns (LSPs) to extract 
Hypernyms from text
Most popular: Hearst Patterns by Marti Hearst 
Example:
“NPx such as NPy” or “NPx and other NPy”
speaker: SYSTEM
